reviewText: All of the best Darabont director efforts in one box, a must for his fans. I personally like The Majestic best, but the others are finbe.

Im just reviewing this bluray collection itswlf. For those who want a great looking collector's box set and you like these three films then you should definitely add it to your collection. The edges are golden and each movie has its own art covered sleeve. Great box set.
This is a good collection of good movies even if they are not as well known.
I am trying to update my DVD's to Blue-Ray.
Cool set but wish it included the mist instead of the majestic , would have made it a nice stephen king trilogy of films
Great blu-ray Edition. I really like the box set itself, very sturdy and nicely made.  I had never seen Majestic but The Shawshank Redemption and The Green Mile are two classics everyone should own.

Three outstanding movies on with solid extras on 4 DVDS. Frank Darabont is a great film maker. Two of the movies were adapted from Stephen King fiction. The Majestic is an unheralded gem. Great package here. The picture and sound quality are excellent.
